column1: Smoque BBQ////Back in 2007...Watched the Triple D show with Guy Fieri (diners
column2: drive ins and dives) on the Food Network channel and went to the restaurant that following week. Blown away by the flavor of the sauces
column5: the friendliness of the staff and most of all...THE BEEF BRISKET! It melts in your mouth and is the best I've had! I grew up in the South and by far
column6: this is the best bbq joint I've eaten at! HIGHLY Recommended!!!!
